title: One Amazing Thing - reaction to events of the day

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Divakaruni uses literary elements and techniques to convey Mrs. Pritchett’s complex reaction to the events of the day.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Divakaruni uses literary elements and techniques to convey Mrs. Pritchett’s complex reaction to the events of the day.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain the function of a character changing or remaining unchanged.
